statements: SELECT * FROM farm_operations;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name FROM farm_operations WHERE renewable_energy_usage > 50;
SELECT carbon_footprint_calculation, farm_name, waste_management_practices FROM farm_operations WHERE carbon_footprint_calculation < 1000;
SELECT farm_name, carbon_footprint_calculation FROM farm_operations ORDER BY carbon_footprint_calculation DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm_operations WHERE waste_management_practices IS NOT NULL AND carbon_footprint_calculation > 500;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name FROM farm_operations WHERE renewable_energy_usage > 0.5 ORDER BY farm_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT farm_name, carbon_footprint_calculation FROM farm_operations WHERE carbon_footprint_calculation < 1000 ORDER BY carbon_footprint_calculation ASC
SELECT * FROM farm_operations WHERE waste_management_practices LIKE '%organic%'
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, carbon_footprint_calculation FROM farm_operations WHERE carbon_footprint_calculation BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY carbon_footprint_calculation DESC
SELECT farm_name, renewable_energy_usage FROM farm_operations WHERE renewable_energy_usage < 0.3 ORDER BY farm_name ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_usage;
SELECT farm_id, energy_type, timestamp FROM energy_usage ORDER BY farm_id DESC;
SELECT waste_type, waste_amount FROM waste_management WHERE waste_disposal_method='Recycling';
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_amount > 1000;
SELECT farm_id, SUM(energy_amount) AS total_energy FROM energy_usage GROUP BY farm_id;
SELECT farm_id, energy_type, energy_amount FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_amount > 1000 ORDER BY energy_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT energy_type FROM energy_usage WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01';
SELECT farm_id, waste_type, waste_amount, waste_disposal_method FROM waste_management WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND waste_amount > 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage eu JOIN waste_management wm ON eu.farm_id = wm.farm_id WHERE eu.timestamp = '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE energy_type LIKE '%Solar%';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy;
SELECT source, amount FROM renewable_energy WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, source, amount FROM renewable_energy ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM waste_management WHERE weight > 100;
SELECT id, type FROM waste_management WHERE disposal_method = 'Recycling';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, source FROM renewable_energy WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY source ASC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_renewable_energy FROM renewable_energy;
SELECT * FROM waste_management WHERE weight < 500 OR disposal_method = 'Recycling' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, type, AVG(weight) AS avg_weight FROM waste_management GROUP BY type HAVING avg_weight > 1000 ORDER BY avg_weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_usage;
SELECT energy_source, energy_consumption FROM renewable_energy_usage WHERE energy_source = 'Solar';
SELECT * FROM waste_management_practices ORDER BY waste_quantity DESC;
SELECT farm_name, location, farm_size FROM farm_operations WHERE average_yield > 50;
SELECT farm_id, total_carbon_emissions, calculation_date FROM carbon_footprint_calculations WHERE total_carbon_emissions < 1000;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_usage ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT energy_source, SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM renewable_energy_usage GROUP BY energy_source;
SELECT wmp.waste_type, wmp.waste_quantity, f.farm_name FROM waste_management_practices AS wmp INNER JOIN farm_operations AS f ON wmp.id = f.farm_id WHERE wmp.recycling_method = 'composting';
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_calculations WHERE total_carbon_emissions > 1000;
SELECT farm_name, farm_size, average_yield FROM farm_operations ORDER BY average_yield ASC, farm_size DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Energy_Usage
SELECT farm_id, energy_source FROM Energy_Usage ORDER BY energy_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM Waste_Management WHERE waste_type='Plastic'
SELECT farm_name, location FROM Farm_Operations WHERE establishment_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT farm_id, crop_type FROM Farm_Details
SELECT * FROM Energy_Usage WHERE energy_amount > 1000 ORDER BY farm_id DESC;
SELECT farm_name, location FROM Farm_Operations WHERE establishment_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY farm_name ASC;
SELECT footprint_category, ROUND(footprint_measure * 1.2, 2) AS adjusted_measure FROM Carbon_Footprint WHERE footprint_measure < 500 ORDER BY adjusted_measure DESC;
SELECT farm_id, SUM(waste_amount) AS total_waste_amount FROM Waste_Management GROUP BY farm_id HAVING total_waste_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_waste_amount DESC;
SELECT farm_name, crop_type FROM Farm_Operations INNER JOIN Farm_Details ON Farm_Operations.id = Farm_Details.farm_id WHERE farm_size > 50 ORDER BY farm_name ASC;
